name: City Stacked Demo
description:
This is a bare bones, buggy, and horrifically unoptimised demo of City Stacked

If you have any feedback please message me at http://planetdrak.tumblr.com/

Controls:

Left mouse button to select

Middle mouse button to rotate the camera

Right mouse button to pan the camera

R to increase elevation tool

F to decrease elevation tool

Space to cancel elevation tool
